effect1.title: Volt Resonance
effect1.description: Increase volt ATK by **20%** and volt resistance by **40%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more volt weapons. This set's effects do not work with others.

advancement.star1: Charging battery grants 1 stack of Overload, increasing max HP by **20%** but increases damage received by **12%** (except when your HP is lower than 50 × volt ATK). Stacks up to **8** times and if not refreshed, lose one stack every **6** seconds.
advancement.star2: Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
advancement.star3: Unleash any volt weapon's skill or discharge skill to gain **2** stacks of Overload. At **8** stacks gain immunity to control effects.
advancement.star4: Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **32%**.
advancement.star5: Every stack of Overload grants a **1.5%** final damage buff.
advancement.star6: Greedy Wolf's lightning conductor effect is increased to: **25%** lightning damage boost for every conductor for **25** seconds.

matrix.set2: Dealing volt damage has a **40%** chance to release chain lightning, dealing **60%/100%/150%/200%** of volt ATK to up to **7** targets, cooldown **2** seconds. Triggering the lightning chain increases volt damage by **12%** for **6** seconds. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, only the highest star set will take effect.
matrix.set4: Using a volt weapon's skill or discharge skill increases volt damage by **25%/28%/31%/34%** for **15** seconds. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, only the highest star set will take effect.

awakening.trait1200: Using a volt weapon's skill or discharge skill grants **1** free dodge, stacking up to **2** times, and increases volt damage by **12%** for **8** seconds, does not stack.
awakening.trait4000: Using a volt weapon's skill or discharge skill grants **1** free dodge, stacking up to **3** times, and increases volt damage by **18%** for **8** seconds, does not stack.
